Struggle.name: Struggle
Struggle.effect: Deals damage to the target. The user also takes 1/4 of the damage it dealt in recoil.

Tackle.name: Tackle
Tackle.effect: Has a high chance of dealing some damages to the target.

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.effect: Burns all enemies around you. it has a small chance of burning the enemy

MegaBall.name: MegaBall
MegaBall.effect: Deals a lot of damage to targets around you.
